message.content:
I need to identify the line items and values related to amounts owed to the entity for goods or services sold on credit.

Looking at the balance sheet provided, I need to find accounts that represent money owed to the business. The most common account for this purpose is "Accounts Receivable," which represents amounts customers owe the business for goods or services they purchased on credit.

From the balance sheet:
- Accounts Receivable has an initial amount of 0.00 on 2023-12-31
- Accounts Receivable has an end amount of 10,221,447.35 on 2024-02-05

This is the value I need to report as it represents money owed to the entity by customers.

```json
{"solution": {'initial value': '0.00', 'end value': '10221447.35'}}
```
